inn1.comm: and he beats him with a jaffa! Lands on a sweet length outside off stump and shapes away as Smith prods forward
and again, a very tentative Smith drives at that loosely and is beaten comprehensively by the late swing, well bowled, sir
this one's straighter and Smith nudges that to mid-on for his first run, South Africa are on the board
full and straight, and Dippenaar flicks that along the ground to short midwicket
fullish on off stump and Dippenaar comes forward awkwardly and defends back to Vaas
good ball again, bang on target and Dippenaar defends that to cover
fullish on middle and leg, Smith works that past Atapattu at midwicket for two
pitched up outside off stump, and Smith presents a full face of the bat and pushes that past mid-off for four, beautiful shot!
quicker on leg stump, Smith looks to work it through the leg side but gets rapped on the back leg,  ball rolls to the off side
leg stump again but he can only turn that straight to square leg
poor ball, lands a mile outside off stump and swings away for Sangakkara to move across and collect
much better, fullish outside off stump and Smith defends back to Malinga
lands on a good length outside off stump, Smith gets half-forward and pushes to cover with a loud call of  "WAIT THERE" to his partner
good delivery outside off stump, defended to cover
full on off stump, Smith drives down the ground but Malinga does well to get his right hand on it and save runs
middle and off this time and Dippenaar turns that down to Malinga at backward square leg to get off the mark
fulll on off stump, Smith works that to Muralitharan at mid-off for one
full outside off stump, Dippenaar drops the hands and the ball rolls to Dilshan at point
lands on middle and off and stands up a tad, Dippenaar gets up and defends
quick on a good length, moves in from off stumps and catches Smith on the hop, ball rolls to the on side
full on off stump, Smith drives but Malinga does well to get a hand on it and save runs
full on middle and leg, worked to square leg
lands on a good length on off stump, defended
lands outside off stump, Dippenaar defends and gets an edge that rolls towards gully, he pinches a run
short and wide, Smith cuts down to wide third man for just the single

gone! Fullish ball on off stump, ball angles in, Smith walks into it and flicks that straight to Jayasuriya at short midwicket! Well bowled, well captained, theres that brilliant use of the fielder at that position, Vaas has struck early
full outside off, defended to cover
moves away sharply from off stump, Gibbs thought about it for a second
full outside off and he drives that to Murali at mid-off
better, full on the stumps and Gibbs gets forward and defends
drifts to middle and leg, Gibbs turns that past square leg and gets off the mark
drifts down the pads and stands up a little, Dippenaar easily flicks that down to Malinga at deep backward square leg
good length ball on the stumps, defended to point
streaky shot, Gibbs turns that off the pads in the air over midwicket for four, ball came onto him earlier there
fuller outside off and he drives nicely to Murali at mid-off and gets a quick run
lands on a good length outside off, Dippenaar stands and defends
again outside off and he drives off the backfoot to cover
short and wide and Gibbs cracks that to Jayawardene at cover
lands outside off and seams away, Gibbs watches it through, will the next ball come into him now?
nope, it also lands outside off in that teasing spot, slants away, and Gibbs can only let it go
similar ball, Gibbs looks to hit that through the offside but gets an inside edge to short midwicket
lands outside off and holds its line, defended with soft hands to point
drifts to leg stump and he flicks that down for four
lands outside off, he pokes at it, gets the edge but the ball drops in front of Sangakkara
lands outside off, he opens the face of the bat and nicely runs that down to third man for four, well played

not this time, though! An edge, a glide to third man, but this time he dangles his bat out at one when he shouldnt have, and gets a regular edge through to Sangakarra who gleefully holds it, Malinga strikes, South Africa are two down
good ball outside off stump, stands tall and defends
full, swinging in, pushed to short midwicket
full on the stumps again, defended with a straight bat
gone, superb 'keeping! Lands outside off stump, invites the drive and he obliges, gets the faintest of edges through to Sangakkara who makes no mistake, wonderful job standing right upto the stumps
bang on target, de Villiers gets on top of it and defends with a dead bat
lands outside off stump and shapes away, left alone
good ball, lands on a good length, Kallis stands tall and defends
outside off stump again, Kallis defends and gets an outer edge along the ground to third man
moves in from off stump, de Villiers looks to work that on the onside, doesnt connect and the ball rolls off the pads
shorter outside off stump but de Villiers cant cut that away
fuller outside off stump, de Villiers defends off the front foot
short of a good length on off stump, he stands tall and defends back to Malinga
a little bit of lift this time from outside off stump, Kallis shoulders arms
fullish outside off stump again, Kallis watches it through
fuller and its pushed into the offside for a quick single
fuller again, pushed to Jayawardene at cover
full again, nicely pushed wide of Murali at mid-off for one, gets off the mark finally
outside off stump, watchfully glided down to third man for one, Kallis will keep strike
stands up outside off stump, Kallis taps that in front of point where Dilshan moves quickly and saves runs
lands outside off and moves in a tad, keeps low too but Kallis negotiates it
slightly short outside off stump, Kallis stands tall and punches that off the backfoot in the gap between cover and point, placed ever so well and speeds away for four, wonderful shot
bad ball, swings wide of the pads
stands up outside off stump again, de Villiers hops and defends
fullish this time, pushed to Murali at mid-off
short outside off stump, de Villiers gets onto it and pulls across the line, connects well and gets four past mid-on, aggressive shot that
full outside off, defended to Dilshan at point
fuller this time and he comes forward and defends
lands outside off, straightens, Kallis opens the face and runs that to Dilshan at point
again, bang on the button, all Kallis can do is get forward and defend to cover
full again, pushed to mid-off
whew, gets it right on the mark outside off, defended to Dilshan at point
lands outside off and moves in, Kallis stands up and runs that to point
short outside off stump, stands up and steers that down to Malinga at third man
lands on off stump and moves into him, worked to Tharanga at midwicket
full outside off stump, de villiers gets down on one knee and square drives that in a flash, ball bounces before screaming to point
SHOT! Full in the slot, comes forward and drives that with a flourish past mid-off and cover for four, not a great ball but well played
outside off stump, played to point
full and right on the stumps, Kallis defends back to Vaas
in the zone outside off stump, Kallis drives exaggeratedly to cover but finds the fielder
bang outside off stump, little movement into him, defends and gets an inside edge
bang on the stumps again, Kallis defends with soft hands to Dilshan at point again
stands up and Kallis awkwardly plays that to cover
lands outside off and moves in, nicely driven to Murali at mid-off
slower ball, moves into him from outside off stump, but well defended to cover
short of a good length and moves in again, defended to mid-on
moves into him, de Villiers walks across the stumps and flicks, but straight to Vaas at leg gully
short this time, de Villiers cuts but to Dilshan at point
moves into him from outside off stump, driven to Maharoof at mid-on and they steal a quick single, beats the throw
drifts onto the pads, well played down past square leg
fullish outside off stump, pushed to mid-off
full again, defended to cover where Dilshan misfields and allows a run
full on the stumps, played back to the bowler
slower and fuller, driven to cover
slightly wider this time, punched to point
full outside off, Kallis mistimes the drive and gets an inside edge to Maharoof at mid-on
lands on a good length and moves into him, Kallis stands and defends
identical ball and he turns that to midwicket

full on the pads, and Kallis clips that past square leg for two, wasnt timed that well, and as he turned for the second run his foot got caught in the crease and he twisted an ankle, in some pain now is Kallis
lands outside off and Kallis shoulder arms
outside off stump again and its steered down to Malinga at third man, Kallis looks okay as he jogs down the pitch
lands on off and cuts in, de Villiers jumps and defends
lands outside off stump, played to Dilshan at point
on the spot again, Kallis looks to give himself some room with that new outside-leg guard, crunches that to cover
identical ball, Kallis drives again and this time Jayasuriya dives over it and allows four through the covers
adjusts his line and fires it in on offstump, defended
full on the stumps again, Kallis drives and gets another inside edge to the on side
well bowled, bang on the off stump, de Villiers defends going forward
full on off stump, defended
wow! Dragged in a tad shorter, Kallis right on top of it and pulls that handsomely over deep backward square leg for maximum, super shot!
outside off stump, played down to third man for one
the slower ball, defends and gets an inside edge to the on side, pops up and they steal one in front of square leg
full outside off, played down to Malinga at third man
fullish on off stump, pushed into the covers
lands outside off and spins in, defended
tossed up again, defended with a stride forward
spins across him, Kallis works that in front of square leg for a sharp single
tossed up, de Villiers comes forward and turns that past mid-on, runs hard but Kallis just trots through
tossed up again, comes forward and defends
tossed up but its a full toss, Kallis sweeps powerfully in front of square, fielder in the deep runs around and collects on the ropes
outside off stump, steered down to third man for one
dropped in short, he latches onto the pull but its not timed all that well, rolls past square leg
slower and moving into him, stops on Kallis who withdraws one hand and drives loosely to mid-off, early into the shot
full outside off stump, Kallis comes forward, smothers the swing and drops that in front of cover, this time he's up for the sharp single
outside off stump, defended
drifts into the pads and he clips that past square leg
tossed up, de Villiers shimmies down and drives back to Murali
sweeps this from off stump down to Fernando at backward square leg
tossed up, comes forward and drives back to Murali
tossed up on middle and off, driven down to long-on for one, thats the 50 stand
tossed up, again de Villiers comes down and flicks to midwicket
a fraction shorter on middle and off, spinning down, de Villiers pulls that down to Fernando for one more
flighted on middle and off, defended
flatter again, defended
tossed up outside off, defended back to the bowler
shorter this time, crunched off the back foot to cover
shortish again, cut to covers
flatter on off stump, Kallis pushes that back to Jayasuriya
short outside off stump, the doosra, but its well picked and smashed past cover, Tharanga in the deep covers good ground and saves four on the ropes, brilliantly done
tossed up on off, Kallis comes forward and defends
tossed up again, whipped to midwicket&
tossed up, swept from outside off in the air but it bounces in front of deep backward square leg
tossed up, uses his feet well and chips that to mid-on
full and faster, defended
pushed back down the track
comes down the track to push it down to long-on
coming in with the angle, backs away to cut but it keeps a touch low, just manages to keep it out
slower and outside off, steered to backward point
comes in with the angle, on the leg and middle, tickled around the corner
tossed outside off, Villiers leans forward and turns it with the spin to short midwicket
runs down the track and whips it with the spin to long leg
lets the ball turn into his pads before tucking it towards square-leg
swept to longleg
on the middle, turned past midwicket
tossed outside off, stopped on the batsman as it gripped the surface, Villiers adjusted to push it to cover
on the middle, swept to long-leg
comes down the track, this one is slightly slower, reaches out to drive to long-off
on the middle, swept to long-leg
fuller and flatter, on the off, driven down the ground
comes down the track to a well-flighted delivery just outside off, and mis-times a flick shot, the ball rolls past short midwicket
almost a mix-up. Kallis pushed one close to the off side, hesitate initially before getting across.
again the sweep shot comes into play
doosra on the off and that bounces a bit to beat the forward prod from Villiers.
mistimes a pull shot to short midwicket
slower on the off, driven inside out to deep cover
comes in with the angle , pushed back to Jayasuriya
When you in doubt, sweep.
slower just outside off, coming in with the arm, defended off the front foot
steered to right of point and the singles keep ticking over
Overpitched and driven to long-on.
fullish on the off, driven straight to cover
slower one, rolled his fingers over it, Kallis waits for the ball to arrive, steers it to backward point
great fielding from Dilshan at point. Punched to right of him and there looked atleast a single there but Dilshan ran a few steps before hurling himself to make the stop
slower one, outside off, steered past cover point
on the legs, worked past square-leg
beaten in flight. Kallis comes down the track but Jayasuriya holds back his length a bit. Kallis tries to adjust but now is beaten by the spin and Sangakkara does the rest
leans forward to dead-bat a tossed up delivery on the off
arm ball on the middle and leg, pushed back down the track
full and just outside the leg stump, swept fine but cant beat the short fine-leg fielder in Murali
speared in on the leg and middle, rapped on the pads
loopy slower one on the legs, worked past square-leg
back of length delivery on the middle, whipped past midwicket
length delivery on the off and middle, pushed to cover
slower one just outside off, Villiers tries to force it away, gets an outer edge to short thirdman
slow through the air outside the off stump, Boucher has to wait for an eternity for it to arrive, cuts to deep cover
draws Villiers forward with a tossed up one, Villiers leans forward to drive it down to long-off
down the legside
again on the legs and Boucher goes for his favourite sweep shot. Sweeps it fine.
Again Dilshan makes a great stop. Moves smartly from cover position to make a diving stop to his left
length delivery on the middle, pushed to cover
slower ball, full and on the legs, worked to Atapattu at deep midwicket
slanted in from wide of the crease, Villiers tries to work it to on side, misses and the ball runs off the pads
dropped! Villiers ends up pushing at a length delivery that stopped on him to the left of Maharoof who stretches his left hand out but can't hold on to the ball
comes in with the angle, cut to  right of short thirdman
swept to right of Muralitharan at short fineleg and they rush across for a quick single
on the legs, swept to long-leg
almost squeezed through the defense.  It was much fuller in length than what Villiers anticipated, set up for a cut but quickly got his bat down in time to push it away
driven to long-leg where Maharoof makes the stop
swept from the stumps, out to long-leg

run out chance missed by Murali. Jayasuriya, who threw the ball from the square-leg position, is pretty livid at the bowler. It was worked to Jayasuriya who swooped in on it and hurled a throw. It bounces in front of Murali who doesn't quite manage to get behind the ball
that sweep shot again.
runs down the track, outside the off stump, and flicks it with the spin towards long-leg
short and outside off, cut past point. Atapattu makes a good diving stop at the deep
dropped! slower and outside off, goes for a cut but gets at thin edge but it pops out of Sangakkara's gloves
driven to long off
punched through the off side ring
Villiers brings up his fifty with a pull. Doosra outside off but short in length gives room for Villiers to move across and pull it past midwicket. First boundary in 20 overs!
works with the spin - a offbreak this time - past midwicket
turns in from outside off, steered to cover point

Villiers perishes trying to up the tempo. He came down the track and whipped a tossed-up offbreak towards widish long-on - intended to send it wider than it went - but Maharoof moves smartly to his right to take a good tumbling catch.
Swept from outside off
Mahela at silly point comes into play. Offbreak that hastened on Kemp, pushed out in a hurry
floated on the legs, attempted sweep shot, ball runs off the pads.
slightly faster and flatter, Kemp is hit on the pads as he tries to work it to on side
Kemp goes for a sweep, in the air, to long-leg
tossed up on the middle, driven to long-on
drifting on to the pads, Kemp tries to tickle it fine, but misses.
sweep shot gets Boucher another single. 150 up fro SA.
leans forward to a tossed-up delivery on the off, pushes it to long-on
works with the spin to midwicket
tossed up full on the middle and leg, Boucher tries sweep it fine but can't beat Jayasuriya at short fine-leg
whips it off the legs, with the spin, to long-leg
doosra beats Kemp outside off.
on the off stump, on a length, turns in slightly, pulled past midwicket
shorter and quicker, outside off, punched to long off
flat and quick, outside off, cut straight to short thirdman
floated up on a length, turned to midwicket
Whoa! Boucher wakes up the crowd with a slog over deep midwicket
doosra on the middle, Kemp gets a leading edge trying to work it to on side

Atapattu makes a great diving stop at deep midwicket. Doosra that was short in length allowed Boucher to go for a pull shot. Atapattu ran a few yards to his left before flinging himself to make the stop.
tossed up delivery on the middle and leg, Kemp is rapped on the pads, again trying to work it to the on side
just outside the leg stump, doosra, attempted sweep shot
doosra but short in length, punched off the back foot past cover
Goes for the sweep but doesn't connect
Jumps down the track, goes for a big lofted drive, mistimes and the ball rolls weakly to short midwicket
low full-toss, driven straight down the ground
arm ball cleans up Kemp. Landed on a length, on the middle and beat the intended slog-sweep to hit middle and leg.
floats an slow delivery on the middle, goes on striaght with the arm, Pollock watches it carefully before blocking it away
leans forward to push it back down the track
Slower one just outside off, sliced over point
on the middle and leg, on a length, punched to wide long-on
slower one outside off, chopped down to thirdman
low full-toss, driven to long-on
slower one again, steered to point
on the middle and leg, worked to deep midwicket
cleans up Boucher with a yorker. Right on the money straightaway. It was just dipping outside the offstump when Boucher's flailing blade got a inside edge that sent it crashing in to the stumps
another yorker, just about managed to dig it out
Ouch. bouncer catches him by surprise. He ducks but is hit on the left shoulder.
low full toss, pushed to deep cover
another one that almost pings the blockhole, dug out to deep cover
another bumper that catches Peterson by surprise. He doesn't quite pick it and ends up ducking right into it. Hit on the left shoulder again.
turned with the spin to midwicket.
turns in from outside off, steered to cover point
tossed up on the middle, defended off the front foot
on the middle, pushed to mid-off
tossed up outside off, full in length, steered past point
leans forward to a offbreak  that lands outside off, pushes it towards point
drilled straight down the ground where Kapugederag makes a good diving stop. Sri Lanka have fielded brilliantly today. Trevor Penny, the fielding coach, must be proud.
slower one, mistimes his drive but gets a single nevertheless
Pollock backs away and Malinga fires in a bouncer, left alone
overpitched on the off, driven to long-off
another short-pitched stuff has Peterson in trouble. Pulls it weakly to midwicket
edged to the thirdman fence. Full and on the off stump line, Peterson throws the kitchen sink at it.
Now four byes. Full and outside the leg stumps, Peterson tries to slog it over midwicket, misses and so does Sangakkara.
slower one disappears over long-on fence. Finally Peterson connects one of his slogs and the white ball sails into the stands.
Now Peterson goes for a inside-out drive over extra cover. Slices it over.  18 runs already in this over.
Aha! another outside edge to the thirdman fence. He tries to slog it over midwicket, instead the ball heads down to thirdman.  22 valuable runs for SA in the over.
low full toss, dragged past midwicket
Pollock smokes a six over long-leg. Banged in short and Pollock pulls it imperiously
pings the blockhole, dug past cover
The plucky 27-balls 42-run partnership between Peterson and Pollock  ends courtesy another Malinga yorker.
Malinga crashes the base of the leg stump. Again. Another one that pinged the blockhole, went off the right boot, on to the leg stump
Malinga doesn't get a hattrick as Ntini puts bat on to the ball. Sends it towards mid-on.

inn2.comm: full and swinging away from outside off stump, bounce dies for Boucher behind the stumps too
shorter outside off stump, Tharanga drives off the backfoot to cover, not timed well at all
lands outside off stump and seams past Tharanga's back-foot prod, wasnt close to it at all
full, Tharanga drives but cant get that past Gibbs at backward point
adjusts his line to slightly closer to off stump, a hint of seam movement off the seam, Tharanga allows it to pass
he oversteps on the effort ball, it was a good delivery that kicked up from middle and off and surprised Tharanga, but its a run
back to a fuller length and Tharanga drives to Peterson at mid-off
fullish outside off stump and Jayasuriya gets on top of that ball, defends to cover
shorter this time, Jayasuriya chops that to cover on the bounce
good length delivery on off stump, Jayasuriya squeezes that past Gibbs' right for one down to third man
excellent delivery, lands seam-up outside off stump and draws Tharanga into the defensive stroke and then nips past the outside edge
another good ball, lands on middle and off and swings past the bat, tickles the edge but lands in front of Boucher
full outside off stump, Jayasuriya tries to cream that past cover but gets an inside edge
lands on a good length and nips into the upper thigh region
ohhhh! Pollock lands this one a fine length and beats Jayasuriya's forward prod by a whisker
lands on middle and off, no room to move whatsoever, Jayasuriya defends to cover
fuller on this occasion, and Jayasuriya works that from off stump all the way past Kemp at mid-on for two, thought about the third but refrained
lands on a good length and moves in, but he has time to push that into the covers
this one kicks from middle and off and surprises Tharanga
lands on middle and leg and catches Tharanga high on the right thigh
short of a good length outside off stump, pushed into the covers
tight stuff from Ntini, forces Tharanga to defend back to him
right on off stump, Jayasuriya defends

and he's gone! Pitches on leg stump and moves in, Jayasuriya gets that pad too far across, rapped, everyone appeals, looked like it would have taken the top of middle and leg, umpire Harper takes his time and then raises the finger, Pollock strikes
short of length on leg stump and angles across him, defended off the back foot to cover
lands outside off stump and keeps low, Tharanga defends and gets an outer edge down to Dippenaar at third man
kicks slightly from a good length on middle and off, defended off the back foot
almost! Dropped in short outside off stump, Tharanga gets anxious and pulls across the line, timed horribly and the ball lands in front of Nel at mid-on, that was close
another good ball spot-on, forces Tharanga back and across in his defence
moves across him from middle and leg, he looks to drive but gets an inside edge past square leg, they run through for two
slower on middle and leg, Jayawardene defends back in the air but the ball dies before Pollock can move to his right and collect
full outside off stump, squeezed past backward point for one down to third man
fractionally short, Tharanga drives off the backkfoot but right to AB de Villiers at cover
again in that same slot and Tharanga slams that to de Villiers, well stopped
fuller on the stumps, Jayawardene looks to work that past midwicket but gets an outside edge that flies in the air between cover and point, he played too early and is lucky to get runs
good ball, lands outside off stump and nips in, Jayawardene defends quite leaden-footed and the ball clips the back pad high up and rolls to Boucher

yes, gone! Short of a good length on middle and leg, rears from where it lands and angles across Tharanga, squares him up outside off stump and forces him to fish, and he gets a simple edge through to Boucher, great delivery from Ntini
good ball to get first up, lands on middle and leg and kicks, Sangakkara defends awkwardly
similar ball but this time he's on top of it and defends back to Ntini's left
he oversteps on this occasion, ball lands on leg stump and Sangakkara, looking to flick that, gets rapped on the pads
fuller on middle and off, he looks to drive but doesnt time that well, ball takes the inside edge towards short midwicket
good ball, moving across from off stump, Sangakkara gets on top of it and defends to cover
lands on off stump and Sangakkara defends off the backfoot to point
fuller on middle and leg, cant work that away
again middle and leg and moving down, Jayawardene tries to work that to square leg but cant time it well, ball pops off the pad and rolls close to the stumps, pushed away by the batsman
this time, however, he times his flick better and gets one down to deep fine leg
full outside off stump, defended to AB de Villiers at cover
slightly short of a good length, punched off the backfoot to mid-off

Pollock strikes! Good delivery on a sweet length outside off draws Sangakkara into a tentative poke at that one, and the slight deviation gets the faint edge, Pollock leaps up in appeal but Sangakkara's already turned for the pavilion, what a fine strike from the veteran bowler
this one lands on middle and leg and moves down, raps Jayawardene high on the pad but that would carried down leg stump, but what an elongated appeal from Nel!
full outside off stump, draws Jayawardene into a drive but he misses
drifts to leg stump and its clipped past square leg for four, top shot
even more down the legside, tucked to square leg for one
lands outside off stump and comes in, Atapattu jumps and gets an inside edge past leg stump, Jayawardene calls for the run and they get it
good ball on off stump, defended back to Nel's right
lands outside off stump, defends and gets the edge in front of point, quick single
moves into him from outside off stump, defended to the onside
lands outside off stump, defended to point
drifts onto the pads and he easily whips that through square leg for four, good shot
good stuff, right upto Jayawardene who defends
pitched up outside off and he has a full-blooded drive, misses completely
good pace, some movement across Atapattu who looks to flick but gets rapped on the pads, missing leg easily

what's he thinking?!? This one lands on a good length outside off and seams in, Atapattu leaves it alone, then sees the ball come in sharply and tries to get the bat down but he's ever so late and the ball clips the top of off stump, beautiful delivery and Nel's letting everyone know what he feels about that wicket
Full outside off stump, driven to cover
shorter and he looks to chop that past point, very nearly chopped on there, whoah, Nelly...
fuller and he's onto the front foot in a hurry, drives that to mid-off, wicket maiden for the big man Nel
way down the pads, Boucher collects, Pollock not happy
good ball on off stump, Jayawardene comes forward and defends with soft hands to kill the swing
good stuff, lands on a good length outside off stump and kicks, Jayawardene goes for a backfoot shot and gets beaten by the movement
fuller this time outside off stump, Jayawardene shoulders arms
right on the stumps, Jayawardene can only defend back to Pollock, who's really hit his straps tonight
fraction shorter and Jayawardene firmly pushes that past de Villiers at cover and gets two
again upto him and he defends back to Pollock
moves down leg, Dilshan tries to pull but fails to make contact
short and wide, begging to be hit, and Dilshan obliges with a spanking cut over a diving Gibbs at backward point for four
better ball, nips in from outside off stump, Dilshan drives at it hard and gets taken by the bounce, edge falls wide of a diving Kallis at second slip and runs away
short again and Dilshan cuts, but nearly chops onto off stump
good ball that nips in from outside off stump, catches him by surprise but he manages to keep that down to the onside
halfvolley around off stump and he just drives that past Nel and mid-off for four
good ball right upto him on off stump, Dilshan defends back to Pollock
stands up a tad from outside off but Dilshan negotiates that off the backfoot
moves into him this time and he defends back to Pollock
lands outside off and Dilshan can only push that back again
fuller and on middle and leg, works that right to square leg
again Pollock lands that on middle and leg, Dilshan gets on top of it and flicks towards midwicket who fields well and fires in a throw, batsmen cross though
lands around off stump and moves in sharply, defended out to cover where de Villiers fires in a throw at the nonstriker's end, beats everyone and they get extras
halfvolley outside off stump, Dilshan leans into and drives that through the gap on the offside for four
better ball, not as full, Dilshan stands and defends back to Nel
fraction fuller, Dilshan onto the front foot and drives to mid-off
banged in short, Dilshan goes for a hook but misses it, not by much, theres some noise there, Boucher takes but no one appeals
full and wide of off stump, Dilshan flashes at that and misses, theres more of that low bounce as Boucher collects
good length on the stumps, Jayawardene defends back to Pollock
jags in a bit from outside off, Jayawardene gets an inside edge onto the pads
nudged from off stump to wide of Peterson at square leg for a single
lands outside off stump and draws the edge from a leaden-footed Dilshan, but lands safely in front of Smith at slip and down to third man, well bowled
worked from middle and off to midwicket

and he ends his spell as he started it, lands one on that sweep spot outside off stump and foxes the batsman into a false defence, ball narrowly misses kissing the outside edge of the bat, well bowled Pollock
right upto the stumps and its defended back to Nel
again upto him and he pushes that into the covers, no chance of a run
a good length ball, Dilshan hurries into his backfoot defense
moves into him and he works that between Peterson and Ntini at mid-off for a single
shot! A fraction short and he gets on top of that and cuts hard past backward point for four
good reply, lands it on a good length and the bounce gets Jayawardene thinking
full outside off stump and its left alone
moves into him from outside off stump, Dilshan stands and defends but gets an inside edge to the onside
on middle and leg, nicely tucked down to deep backward square leg
this time he waits on it and works that past midwicket, calls for two from the start and gets it, well run
misses a wild cut to one marginally outside off stump
gets it to move into him, stands up and works that right to Smith at midwicket
good ball outside off stump forces Jayawardene to play and miss, didnt move the feet at all
lands outside edge, Jayawardene manages to keep that down and gets one down to third man
fuller and Dilshan drives to Kemp back at the circle at mid-off
moves into him from outside off, turned to midwicket with a call of 'NO' back to Dilshan
drifts to leg and its flicked in the air past square leg down to Peterson in the deep, who doesnt field cleanly and they get two
middle and leg again, flicked down to Dippenaar at backward square leg
good length outside off stump, Jayawardene comes forward and pushes to cover, calls for one and gets it, overthrow allows the second
shorter and its cut down to third man
quicker and fuller, squeezed to a diving Gibbs at backward point, good stop
fuller in the blockhole, moving into leg, not timed to perfection but he'll still get one to mid-off
a fraction shorter on middle and off, pushed down the ground but mid-on comes across and fields
dragged in shorter and Dilshan pulls that to square leg, not timed well and they only get a single
and he begins with a full and wide delivery outside off, Dilshan has a swing but gets beaten by that disconcerting low bounce
fuller this time and Dilshan's onto the front foot, drives to mid-off
in the blockhole, dug out to de Villiers at cover, theres a heck lot of dew on that ball, its constantly being wiped by the fielders
good length ball kicks up from outside off stump, Dilshan does well to defend off the back foot to de Villiers again
fuller on off stump but Dilshan cant time his drive well, inside edge to the on side
full outside off stump, Dilshan drives down the ground, Ntini gets a hand to it and the ball ricochets near the stump, rolls away and they steal a run
lands outside off and stands up, but he runs that down to third man

gone! Full outside off and he drives that to Gibbs at backward point, who dives to his left, picks and throws in one smooth action, ball comes back to Kallis, who cant collect it but out of the blue dives Pollock, Jonty-style, moving forward, collects the ball and whips off the bails! Talk about a turning point...
banged in short, Dilshan goes for a ferocious pull, ball clangs into the helmet and runs down to third man for four
a fraction short outside off and an impatient Dilshan tries to flay that past point, for the third time he nearly chops on
nips into him from outside off stump, played down to point
good ball outside off, defended to point again
well outside the off stump, delivered from wide of the crease, left alone
this one kicked up from a length after landing well outside the off stump, Maharoof has a poke at it
again outside the off, left alone
back of length, comes in a touch from outside the off stump, pushed to the off side
slow linking full-toss on the off, punched to mid-off
short of length, on the off and middle, pushed to mid-on
short of length outside off, pushed to point
overpitched on the middle, driven to wide of mid-on
beaten outside off.  length delivery that held its line and Maharoof ended up pushing inside the line
And again.
length delivery on the off, coming in a touch, pushed to the on side
full and straight, angling into the right hander, defended on the front foot towards cover
strays very wide down leg side, wide called, the dew is taking effect
another wide down leg side
he overcompensates by bowling wide outside off stump, Dilshan tries to cut but gets a bottom edge to point where Gibbs shies at the stumps and concedes overthrows
pushed to cover for a single
pitches on off stump and shapes away from the batsman who drives at it but gets beaten
full on the pads, Maharoof tries to flick but misses and gets hit on the pad
drifting down leg side, this time Maharoof places it in the gap between midwicket and mid-on
full and on the off, coming in a touch, Maharoof has a waft at it, gets his bat down slightly outside the line and the ball rolls to the on side
banged in short and pulled over the infield. Didn't time it well though.

And then there were four. Maharoof' lack of footwork does him in. On a driveable length outside the off stump, Maharoof drives, his feet sticking adhesively to the crease, and doesn't lean onto his drive, gets an outside edge and is swallowed by Smith in the slips.
beaten! slanted outside off, Vaas pushes inside the line.
full and pushed across, Vaas goes back and across to push it to mid-off. The length demanded that he be on his front foot but Vaas is hanging back at his crease
slanted across again but this time well outside the off stump, left alone
half-volley outside off, driven to left of cover
beaten by the lack of bounce. Landed on the off stump line and slanted away. It kept low and had Vaas searching for it
Again Vaas is caught hanging too deep at the crease. HAs a go at a fullish delivery but doesn't connect
near-fatal waft outside the offstump
fullish on the middle and leg, curving in, flicked past square-leg
full and just outside the off stump, steered to left of backward point where Gibbs makes a good diving stop
back of length delivery, bounces above the waist, cut to deep point
square-driven past point. Bit of room and Vaas was quick to pounce
And again. This time a cover drive. Overpitched outside the off, Vaas drilled it past cover
hit straight to mid-off and they run with the stroke. Vaas will be on strike now.
pushed across Vaas who pushes at it, gets an inside edge that takes the ball to the on side&
huh... Vaas really goes in search of that almost wide delivery outside the off stump. Throws his bat at a fullish delivery, outside edge takes it to thirdman
classy square-drive. Slightly short of length and outside the off stump, Dilshan whiplashed it past backward point
on the leg and middle, tucked past square-leg
length delivery on the off and middle, punched to mid-off
on the middle and leg, swatted to short midwicket
bouncer that sailed over top of Dilshan's head. No ball called. Dilshan had initially shaped up for a hook but pulled out at the last minute
length delivery on the off and middle, defended off the front foot
dasher Dilshan throws the kitchen sink at a slower ball outside the off stump but doesn't connect.
connects his cover drive this time. Overpitched outside the off and drilled past cover
just short of driveable length, on the middle and off, pushed to cover
Oh What a catch by Gibbs!  It was screaming to his left at point when he dived  to come up with the catch. Dilshan had carved a short of length delivery  but couldn't keep it down and paid for it
fullish outside off, steered to cover point
comes in with the angle, full in length, steered to point
goes back to a length delivery, pushes it to extra cover
full and on the middle, Malinga stays back and flicks it around the corner.
leans forward to dead-bat a length delivery
slapped over midwicket. Banged in short and Vaas rocked back to smoke it over the infield
outside the off stump, but no violence this time from Vaas. He lets it go through to Boucher
fullish, on the off, pushed past cover
from round the stumps, full and on the off, pushed to mid-on
length delivery outside the off, driven on the up to mid-off
back of length delivery on the leg and middle, Vaas tried to work it to on side, got a leading edge to wide thirdman
Nel guns for Malinga's throat. Malinga ducks and just about evades being hit.
Bulls eye this time. Reared up from back of length, a clueless Malinga pushed at it, eyes off the ball, and popped up a catch, off his gloves, to the second slip.
Slapped past mid-on. On the middle, on a length, and Murali swatted it to right of mid-on
And then there were one. Murali backs away as expected and goes for a lofted shot over the bowler's head. But scoops straight to Pollock at long-on
length delivery on the middle, pushed to off side
delivered from wide of the crease, landed on the leg and angling across, punched past point
hit the deck short of length, outside the off, Fernando pushes at it inside the line
length delivery on the off, driven to point
short of length, on the middle, pulled to mid-on
short of length, outside the off, steered to point
almost game over. Fernando pokes at a fullish delivery but doesn't get a nick
bouncer and Fernando ducks under. Flies over the head.
spanked past mid-on. Short of length delivery, outside the off, swatted away
driven straight. too straight as it cleans up the sticks at the other end.
leans forward to push a fullish delivery to mid-off

short and pulled over midwicket. Kemp makes a good diving stop near the ropes. Its been tremendous fielding display from both teams today. Both Jonty Rhodes and Trevor Penny would be pretty happy with their boys.
drilled straight down the ground. Half-volley on the middle and off stump line, muscled past the bowler
short and Vaas rocks back to pull it over midwicket.

South Africa have scripted a wonderful come-from-behind victory. The final nail in the coffin was delivered by Kemp. Low dipping yorker catches Fernando in front, leaving Vaas stranded and Sri Lanka perilously close to being ousted from the tournament
